titleStmt.title: Floures for Latine spekynge selected and gathered oute of Terence, and the same translated in to Englysshe, together with the exposition and settynge forthe as welle of suche latyne wordes, as were thought nedefull to be annoted, as also of dyuers grammatical rules, very profytable [and] necessarye for the expedite knowledge in the latine tongue: compiled by Nicolas Vdall
Selections. English and Latin
titleStmt.author: Terence.
Udall, Nicholas, 1505-1556.

notesStmt.note: Each passage in Latin followed by English translation.
Imprint from colophon; foreword dated: pridie calendas Martias .. 1534.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
